targets.expr:
sum(rate(http_requests_allowed_total{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~".+"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_namespace) /
sum(rate(http_requests_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~".+"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_namespace)

sum(rate(http_requests_blocked_total{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~".+"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_namespace) /
sum(rate(http_requests_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~".+"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_namespace)

sum(rate(http_requests_rejected_total{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~".+"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_namespace) /
sum(rate(http_requests_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~".+"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_namespace)

sum(rate(http_requests_allowed_total{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~"$service_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) /
sum(rate(http_requests_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~"$service_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name)

sum(rate(http_requests_blocked_total{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~"$service_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) /
sum(rate(http_requests_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~"$service_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name)

sum(rate(http_requests_rejected_total{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~"$service_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) /
sum(rate(http_requests_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", kubernetes_name=~"$service_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name)

sum(rate(http_requests_allowed_total{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name) /
sum(rate(http_requests_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)

sum(rate(http_requests_blocked_total{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name) /
sum(rate(http_requests_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)

sum(rate(http_requests_rejected_total{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name) /
sum(rate(http_requests_duration_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod_name"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
